summary: A collection of pytest suites that verify Amazon MQ management functionalities—including broker lifecycle, configuration handling, tag operations, user account CRUD, and server listing—by exercising the code against a mocked AWS environment provided by Moto.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of Amazon MQ integration code, ensuring that broker, configuration, tag, and user operations behave as expected and regressions are caught during development.
